doc.p: This website was launced today. The entire site is automagically rebuilt each night from the xml sources in the subversion repository. A script fetches the subversion sources, and runs xml proc on the xml files using an xslt stylesheet to create the site. Each part of the site is stored in a separate file that only contains data. What is to built is written the site.xml file, and based on that the xslt processor goes through the files and creates menus and links, in essence creates the entire site.
You can find the sources for the builder in our svn repository or simply under the website directory
